text: If 2 Two's Complement numbers are added, and they both have the same sign (both positive or both negative), then overflow occurs if and only if the result has the opposite sign. Overflow never occurs when adding operands with different signs. i.e. « Adding two positive numbers must give a positive result « Adding two negative numbers must give a negative result 0111 1001 1011 1011 + 0011 1011 1110 1110 = 1011 0101 1010 1001 1111 0111 0110 1001 + 1000 0001 0110 0100 = 1011 1100 01100 1101 Overflow never occurs when adding operands with different signs, so, in options C, and D, we don't have an overflow.
